## PublishInfo type

Represents publishing information for Repository local objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PublishInfo = {
    $type?: string;
    PublishedAt?: string;
    RenderedWith?: Link;
    Repository?: Link;
    TargetPurpose?: string;
    TargetType?: Link;
    User?: Link;
};
```
